titlepage.titleproper:
Finding aid for
Commercial catalog collection, 1870s-2000s
titlepage.author:
Finding aid created by
Michigan Historical Collections staff

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: This collection of Michigan-based commercial trade catalogs was accumulated from different sources.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyrights is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Commercial catalog collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Bentley Historical Library early in its history began developing a collection of commercial trade catalogs. These catalogs have been drawn together from many sources to aid researchers interested in a specific industry or product.

scopecontent.p: This collection of Michigan-based trade catalogs dates from the 1870s and continues to the present. The collection is arranged alphabetically by broad product classification, for example agricultural machinery, furniture, etc. Within each category, the catalogs have been arranged alphabetically by the name of the company, and then chronologically. The researcher should note that there is a separate finding aid for the library's collection of commercial catalogs for automobiles and motor trucks.
